title: rAmacandran malaraDi
sahitya:
rAmacandran malaraDi iravu paghal maravaa anbarai bhaji


anupallavi

  sOma sUryar uLLavarai azhiyA tUya caritran sajjana mitran


caraNam    vanattil alainda vEdanai vAlmIki mAmunivarAkkina adbhutam
vara muni nAradar bhramanum pugazhnd-uraitta citra caritam
punitam enru kAshi sarvEshvaran pugazhndaruL rAma nAma vinOdan
bhUmi mAl maNALan aram vaLara avataritta guNALan shrI
